# Pull Request

## 📋 Description
Brief description of the changes in this PR.

## 🔄 Type of Change
- [ ] 🐛 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] ✨ New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] 💥 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] 📚 Documentation update
- [ ] 🔧 Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] ⚡ Performance improvement
- [ ] 🔒 Security enhancement
- [ ] 🧪 Test improvements

## 🎯 Related Issues
Closes #(issue number)
Related to #(issue number)

## 🧪 Testing
- [ ] Tests pass locally (`cargo test --workspace`)
- [ ] Added tests for new functionality
- [ ] Updated existing tests as needed
- [ ] Integration tests pass
- [ ] Manual testing completed

### Test Coverage
Describe what testing was done:
- Unit tests: [describe]
- Integration tests: [describe]
- Manual testing: [describe]

## 📚 Documentation
- [ ] Updated relevant documentation
- [ ] Added rustdoc comments for new public APIs
- [ ] Updated README.md if needed
- [ ] Updated API documentation
- [ ] Added examples for new features

## 🔍 Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines (`cargo fmt`)
- [ ] No new clippy warnings (`cargo clippy`)
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Comments added for complex code
- [ ] No hardcoded values (use configuration)
- [ ] Error handling is appropriate

## 🔒 Security Considerations
- [ ] No sensitive information exposed
- [ ] Input validation added where needed
- [ ] Authentication/authorization considered
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Cryptographic operations reviewed

## ⚡ Performance Impact
- [ ] No performance regression
- [ ] Performance improvements measured
- [ ] Memory usage considered
- [ ] Database queries optimized

## 💥 Breaking Changes
If this is a breaking change, describe:
- What breaks
- Migration path for users
- Deprecation notices added

## 📸 Screenshots (if applicable)
Add screenshots to help explain your changes.

## ✅ Checklist
- [ ] I have read the [contributing guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

Any special deployment considerations:
- Database migrations needed
- Configuration changes required
- Service restart required
- Rollback plan

Add any other notes about the PR here.
